cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 310 mi south of Cameron, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: Turning north, then north-northeast and tracking toward the Louisiana coast/northern Gulf Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the southwest–central Louisiana coast (High Island TX to Morgan City LA corridor)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch east of the Pearl River to Bay St. Louis MS (well east of Corpus Christi)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning High Island TX to Morgan City LA; Tropical Storm Warning west of High Island to Sargent TX and east of Morgan City LA to Pearl River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primary impact zone from High Island TX eastward across all of coastal Louisiana and into Mississippi
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (<10%) of tropical-storm-force gusts; breezy conditions possible Friday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor tidal anomalies (<1 ft) possible; no significant surge expected
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands could bring 1–2 inches of rain Thursday night–Friday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Hazardous seas and rip currents along the lower Texas coast
